seo.title: SustainSage | Coaching for calm, bilingual transitions
seo.description: Bilingual coaching for UK-based professionals navigating career, culture, and life transitions. SustainSage offers ICF-aligned conversations in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese.

hero.title: Calm, client-led coaching for real-life transitions
hero.subtitle: For professionals navigating change across cultures, careers and countries. A steady space to think clearly, choose next steps, and move at your pace.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book an intro session with SustainSage
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a coach and client planning next steps

forWhom.title: Who coaching is for
forWhom.intro: We work with people balancing cross-cultural lives, caregiving, and careers who want space to decide without pressure.

items.title: Mid-career restarters
items.description: Refresh direction after redundancy, burnout or a long pause—without tossing aside what you have built.

items.title: Newcomers working abroad
items.description: Bridge UK workplace expectations with your home-culture instincts so decisions feel honest.

items.title: Early-career explorers
items.description: Test possibilities after graduation with low-risk experiments instead of all-or-nothing leaps.

items.title: Carers and parents on pause
items.description: Re-enter work or reshape routines with support that respects caregiving, energy and capacity.

servicesOverview.title: Ways to work together
servicesOverview.intro: Each format begins with an intro conversation to scope goals, languages, and boundaries together.

cards.title: Reset / Direction · 4 sessions
cards.description: Short, focused coaching to regain clarity around a single transition or decision point.

cards.title: Sustain / Deepen · 8 sessions
cards.description: Longer partnerships for ongoing change, accountability, and reflective pauses across a season.

cards.title: Single deep dive · 90 minutes
cards.description: One-off session to map options, name boundaries, or prepare for a pivotal conversation.

howItWorks.title: How coaching flows
howItWorks.intro: We stay non-directive and consent-led, adjusting cadence so you can absorb insights without overwhelm.

steps.title: Intro call
steps.description: Align on expectations, scope, and boundaries, and decide together whether coaching is the right fit.

steps.title: Coaching sessions
steps.description: 4–6 sessions per cycle with reflective questions, cultural translation, and experiments that you choose.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Harvest learning, agree next steps, and either continue, pause, or close the work with clarity.

whySustainSage.title: Why SustainSage
whySustainSage.intro: A bilingual, ICF-aligned practice grounded in calm structure and real-life pressure awareness.

points.title: ICF-aligned ethics
points.description: Transparent contracts, informed consent, and clear safeguarding from first contact onwards.

points.title: Cross-cultural & bilingual
points.description: UK-based coaches fluent in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese with diaspora lived experience.

points.title: Calm, structured, zero hype
points.description: Evidence-informed coaching that honours pacing—no forced positivity, no hustle slogans.

founders.title: Meet the founders
founders.intro: We are coaches and facilitators who bridge UK and Taiwanese contexts, design thinking, and community practice.

people.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
people.bio: Integrates systems thinking, civic design, and bilingual facilitation so experiments stay rooted in reality.

people.name: Yi-Ling Lai
people.bio: Holds reflective, trauma-informed space for diaspora professionals balancing family, work, and wellbeing.

cta.title: Ready to take the next steady step?
cta.body: Share what you are navigating and we will co-design a coaching rhythm—or signpost alternatives if coaching is not right now.
